# `standardise_flex`

standardise_flex


## Description

standardizes a matrix


## Usage

```r
standardise_flex(x, center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`x`     |     matrix
`center`     |     center data
`scale`     |     scale data


## Value

standardized matrix
